level.heading: Domestic partnership benefits.
level.text: All health care facilities, including hospitals, convalescent facilities, or other long term care facilities, shall allow a patient's family member as defined in § 32-701(7) to visit the patient.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-114, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-701.
